entity.name: Jayachandra
entity.description: I'm an Android developer based in Hyderabad, India, focused on creating privacy-centric tools. EchoNum is designed to enhance user control over app internet access, aiming to improve data privacy and battery efficiency.

projects.name: EchoNum
projects.description: EchoNum is an Android application that allows users to restrict internet access for selected apps exclusively to their foreground usage. Utilizing Android's VPN and accessibility services, it ensures that controlled apps have internet access only when actively in use, thereby enhancing privacy and conserving data and battery life.

plans.description: Development and testing of the application, user interface enhancements, security audits, and marketing efforts.
